Package jexec

Interface Executor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorExecutor, ExecutedExecutor, JExecExecutor, SuccessExecutor
    public interface Executor
    A interface to be implemented in the executors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void command()
      command() is designed to be called by the thread that creates run(), it is generally not implemented by executors and is used to call exec (JExec jExec) and exec (String command)
      JExec exec​(java.lang.String command)
      exec(String command) creates new JExec object and call exec(JExec jExec) with that object
      JExec exec​(JExec jExec)
      exec(JExec jExec) runs the JExec object that is passed in the arguments, it is typically used in the implementation of command()
      void kill()
      It forcibly kills the thread
      void onError​(Logger logger, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Is called by run() when command() has thrown some exceptions
      void onExecuted​(Log log, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Is called by exec(JExec jExec) after the command is executed
      void onSuccess​(Logger logger)
      Is called by run() when command() has not thrown any exceptions
      void redirectConsole()
      Redirects the output and input of the commands to stdout and stdin of the program
      void run()
      Create a new thread and execute command(), this call onSuccess(Logger logger) when command() throw any exception or onError(Logger logger, Exception exception) when something thrown
      void term()
      Send interrupt to the thread
      void workDir​(java.io.File workDir)
      Set the commands workdir
      void workDir​(java.lang.String workDir)
      Set the commands workdir
      void workDir​(java.nio.file.Path workDir)
      Set the commands workdir

    • Method Detail

      • exec

        JExec exec​(JExec jExec)
    throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
           java.io.IOException,
           CommandErrorException
        exec(JExec jExec) runs the JExec object that is passed in the arguments, it is typically used in the implementation of command()
        Parameters:
        jExec - The object to be executed
        Returns:
        The executed object
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if term () is thrown, this exception will be thrown
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs eg: missing command, incorrect permissions...
        CommandErrorException - Thrown if command return non-zero value

      • exec

        JExec exec​(java.lang.String command)
    throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
           java.io.IOException,
           CommandErrorException
        exec(String command) creates new JExec object and call exec(JExec jExec) with that object
        Parameters:
        command - A command to create JExec object
        Returns:
        The executed object
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if term () is thrown, this exception will be thrown
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs eg: missing command, incorrect permissions...
        CommandErrorException - Thrown if command return non-zero value

      • command

        void command()
      throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
             java.io.IOException,
             CommandErrorException
        command() is designed to be called by the thread that creates run(), it is generally not implemented by executors and is used to call exec (JExec jExec) and exec (String command)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - When something methods inside command() thrown this exception
        java.io.IOException - When something methods inside command() thrown this exception
        CommandErrorException - When something methods inside command() thrown this exception

      • run

        void run()
        Create a new thread and execute command(), this call onSuccess(Logger logger) when command() throw any exception or onError(Logger logger, Exception exception) when something thrown

      • term

        void term()
        Send interrupt to the thread

      • kill

        void kill()
        It forcibly kills the thread

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess​(Logger logger)
        Is called by run() when command() has not thrown any exceptions
        Parameters:
        logger - The logger of the executed commands

      • onError

        void onError​(Logger logger,
             java.lang.Exception exception)
        Is called by run() when command() has thrown some exceptions
        Parameters:
        logger - The logger of the executed commands
        exception - The exception thrown by command()

      • onExecuted

        void onExecuted​(Log log,
                java.lang.Exception exception)
        Is called by exec(JExec jExec) after the command is executed
        Parameters:
        log - The log of the executed command
        exception - The exception thrown by execution of command, or null if no exception has been thrown

      • redirectConsole

        void redirectConsole()
        Redirects the output and input of the commands to stdout and stdin of the program

      • workDir

        void workDir​(java.io.File workDir)
        Set the commands workdir
        Parameters:
        workDir - The workdir to setup

      • workDir

        void workDir​(java.nio.file.Path workDir)
        Set the commands workdir
        Parameters:
        workDir - The workdir to setup

      • workDir

        void workDir​(java.lang.String workDir)
        Set the commands workdir
        Parameters:
        workDir - The workdir to setup
